pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by Michael Poma  Jenzabar  June 3, 2016  Using PowerFAIDS Report Writer  #1284 © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Topics     Standard Reports     Custom Reports     Sample Reports © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     What’s already in there?     How do I set it up to run?     Can I schedule to run while I am out?  Exploring Standard Reports – Overview © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Year Specific     Pre-written and formatted     Up to five (5) reports can be run in a group     Any report can be scheduled to run unattended     Save, Print, Export or E-mail the results  Exploring Standard Reports – What’s already in there? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Award Analysis/Details/Summary     Loan Details (CommonLine and Direct)     Institutional Research (DIST, Lifetime, Zip Code, Last College)     Labels (Folder and Mailing)     Packaging Details     Rosters (Tracking and Student)  Exploring Standard Reports - What’s already in there? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Some questions to answer  •   One or several in a group?  •   Same population each time?  •   Ad hoc, requested, or scheduled?  Exploring Standard Reports – How do I set it up to run? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Ad hoc uses the Report Wizard     Requested/Scheduled  •   Click Add  •   Choose the Name  •   Choose the Population  •   Choose the Report(s)  How do I set it up to run? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     YES!     Or even while you are in but working on something else     Only one report at a time     You choose the duration     You choose the recurrence  Can I schedule it to run while I am out? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Send the results to an e-mail recipient as an attachment     Send an e-mail to let the recipient know where to open the results – recommended if SSNs are involved     Place the results in a shared folder  Can I schedule it to run while I am out? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Identify the selection set in the group name     Have an “Ad Hoc” report that uses the “all students” selection set and has no report selected     Create a separate group for every set of reports using the same selection set  What about Best Practices? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Review your population group (Selection Set) for accuracy     Review your General Parameters (IM or FM)     Review your data for accuracy     Or, create a Custom Report...  What if I cannot find what I need? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     What is the purpose of the report?     What data do you need?     Will you need hard copy or soft copy?     Do you need totals?     Could this report serve more than one purpose?     Where can I find the data?  Custom Reports – Think before you begin © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Federal or State report  •   Fields dictated by reporting requirements  •   Backup – export to Excel     Reconciliation     Data Integrity  What is the purpose of the Report? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Student ID     Student First and Last Name     Student Tracking Status     Student Status     Credits enrolled     Fund Name     Actual Amount     Disbursed Amount  Create a report that will include: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     From welcome screen  •   Select from left page  •   Select from tools menu  Getting to Report Writer © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     To create new custom report, click Manage Custom Report Definitions  Welcome Screen © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Custom Report Definitions © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     The left pane lists all custom reports     The “All Custom Reports” lists alphabetically the reports     Categories can be created for organizing by report types     Click ADD to create new report  Managing reports © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Enter Report ID, up to 8 characters     Enter Description     Enter Title     Choose Category     Click SAVE  Custom Report Details – EDIT tab © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     This screen defines the data fields to be included on the report.  Details tab © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     The upper section lists all columns in the tables selected in the Details Page.     The lower section is for the inclusion or exclusion criteria  Where tab © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     In Student module, hover over a field     Pop-up box shows  •   Mnemonic  •   Description  •   Table  •   Column     Data field may not have mnemonic but may be used in reports  Locating data fields © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Data Element   Table   Mnemonic  Student ID   Student   ID-ALT  Student First Name   Student   Name-F  Student Last Name   Student   Name-L  Student Tracking Status   Stu_award_year   Trackstat  Student Status   Stu_award_year   Admstat  Credits Enrolled   Stu_award_year   SAY-Credits  Fund Name   Stu_award   (no mnemonic)  Actual Amount   Stu_award   AwardAmt  Disbursed Amount   Stu_award   Dispaid-awd  Award Year   Stu_award_year   Award_year  Detail page © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Recommend always adding stu_award_year.award_year_token to all reports     Student: Name, ID     Stu_award_year: Trackstat, admstat     Say_fm_stu: EFC (cc-tfc)     Stu_award: fund name, actual amount  Sample Report © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Report Definitions     Categories     Report Formatting     Joins     Details     Where Clauses     Advanced Filter  Exploring the Hidden Secrets © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Can be imported and exported as SPC files     Common reports can be shared with other institutions that use standard PowerFAIDS fields  •   custom data fields will not match after transfer     Additional reports are available at the PowerFAIDS website  Report Definitions © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Use the categories to group reports by user or by type     PowerFAIDS comes with two (2) defaults, student information and institutional parameters     Additional categories can be created     When sharing reports, tell the recipient the category name and number  Categories © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Create the default way the report will look     Report Headings     Report Details (general default)     Date/Time page Formatting  Report Formatting © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Databases are made up of tables and columns     Joins are the common data elements (columns) that the tables have in common     Not all tables have the same join elements     When creating a report, always start with data elements from the most common tables  •   Stu_award_year  •   Student  •   Stu_award  Joins © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Dbo.student     Dbo.stu_award     Dbo.stu_award_year     Dbo.student_addresses     Dbo.say_fm_stu     Dbo.stu_award_loan_supp     Dbo.v_disb_poe_summary  Key join tables © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     View Joins shows how the tables are linked together for the specific report     Print, Sort, and Group     Join type  •   F=From  •   W=Where  Details © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     More Options overwrite the default Report formatting details  •   Format  •   Summation  •   Length  Details © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Using tables, selected in the Report create a query to change the results retrieved     Specific column does not need to be printed     In and Like     Can be used to eliminate one to many or many to many Issues  Where © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Click arrow (tornado), click custom, then simple or advanced  Advanced filters © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Award detail by fund     Award analysis by fund     Reconciliation report     IPEDS     FISAP  Standard Reports to look at © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     FED1ROW$     Inst summary data (JAM1)     Student by tracking status (JAM2)     Awards broken down by POE (JAM3)     NCAA (JAM4)     MISS DOC  Some Sample Custom Reports © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.
